greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Integers but with the primes squared.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
formula: a(n) = (n! mod n^2) + n, n>0, n != 4. - _Gary Detlefs_, Feb 21 2011
mathematica: Table[ If[ !PrimeQ[n], n, n^2], {n, 0, 64}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 19 2005 *)
program: (MAGMA) [0] cat [IsPrime(n) select n^2 else n: n in [1..70]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 17 2017
results.author: _Parthasarathy Nambi_, Mar 17 2005
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 19 2005
